levelledPara.title: Purpose
levelledPara.para: This module describes the optimized geometry of the BH-STA350 bulkhead, designed to reduce mass while maintaining structural integrity and compliance with pressure and thermal loads.

levelledPara.title: Optimization Method
levelledPara.para: The bulkhead geometry was refined using topology optimization algorithms constrained by CS-25.365 and DO-160G thermal profiles. Load paths were redistributed to minimize material usage in low-stress zones.

levelledPara.title: Geometry Features
levelledPara.para: The final design includes tapered ribs, variable-thickness webs, and cutouts aligned with sensor cable routing. Finite element analysis confirms improved stiffness-to-weight ratio and reduced peak stress concentrations.

levelledPara.title: Compliance
levelledPara.para: The optimized bulkhead meets CS-25.365 for pressure vessel design and CS-25.571 for fatigue resistance. It is validated under the BH-STA350_SKEL_VALIDATED badge and tracked in the UTCS registry.
